snippet: A panel led by a former education secretary wants to make it easier for universities to offer online courses across state lines by relaxing the current patchwork of rules and fees.
abstract: Commission on online learning led by former Education Secretary Richard W Riley proposes easier way for universities to offer online courses across state lines by relaxing current patchwork of rules and fees.
lead_paragraph: A panel led by a former education secretary wants to make it easier for universities to offer online courses across state lines by relaxing the current patchwork of rules and fees.

headline.seo: Online Courses Should Be Easier to Offer Out of State, Panel Says
headline.main: State Lines May Ease for Classes Held Online
headline.print_headline: State Lines May Ease For Classes Held Online
